Address.Summary: Login: Error messages in the login form are displayed in English
Address.Steps: 1. Open front end https:/www.test-obelink.be:8443/ 2. Follow Inloggen link 3.Fill required fields with invalid data 4.Click Inloggen button 5.Pay attention to error messages
Address.Actual: Error messages in the login form are displayed in English
Address.Expected: Error messages in the login form are displayed in the chosen language
